articles.title: ‘Dangerous’ Kiwi obliterates hapless Aussies - news.com.au
articles.description: Australia has copped a rare thrashing in its final warm-up match ahead of the Women’s Cricket World Cup, with New Zealand cruising to a nine-wicket victory at Christchurch’s Bert Sutcliffe Oval on Tuesday.

articles.description: Ja Morant dropped 52 points to beat the Spurs on Monday, breaking the franchise record for points just two days after setting it.
